# ladtools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`ladtools` stores some functions I find useful for my data analysis workflow and the `ggplot2` theme for [my website](https://www.lukedimartino.com).

## Installation

You can install the development version of ladtools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ldimartin0/ladtools")
```
